title: Adc builds thread

Edit: For anyone looking to try Shaco this season, the best strat I could find on him so far was to get {{item:1400}} {{item:3117}} and then stack {{item:1038}} until you run out of room because there are really no good items on him anymore and the amount of burst he has with raw AD is too funny to pass up.
